title: Office Hours: A Student and Professor Story
description: Mara knew it was a bad idea to plagiarize her paper. So when she gets caught by her professor, she expects to get expelled. But unfortunately - or fortunately? - Professor Murray has other ideas in mind for the student he's always desired...***A sexy novelette featuring a very bad professor, light bondage, and some fun with food!***The first standalone book in a series featuring drop-dead sexy guys who make very indecent proposals to the women they want. WORD COUNT: 8,800
author: Isla Chiu
